entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fourchu Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Louisbourg 03:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 near midnight then becoming north 20. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 8:46 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:46 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 8:46 PM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
